name: Fruity fix Splash 2
description:
Fruity fix Splash 2

THis game play involves to run connecting three lines of fruits with super six different colored fruits yellow, red, blue, green and purple colors made in best grand gardenscapes farm plants in magic sunny day .

The fruit can be linked horizontally, vertically &fruit crush special bonuses are rewarded for connecting longer lines!

Tip #1: Create clash smash and Destroy – Methodically

Go for the matches that will give you the highest amount of points blast as often as you can do okey candy experience without getting angry. Because Matching four is better than three.

tip #2: Power Ups

The game offers power ups,you obtain these trough playing,And with coins won in Lucky wheel In the shop you can buy power ups and use them right away to help get through a levels more quickly,

but it will be worth it in the end if you save them like some true heroes for when you’re in a tough spot.

Tip #3 Lucky spin wheel

Wheel of Fortune is giving you like lords daily free spin chance. The wheel geometry is lined with 8 boosters on plates and plus you have variety of winnings that will help you

go up to hill and continue playing & score & talking about the game much much longer!
